comments: Claxton (BKN) cleanly deflects the ball away from Williams Jr. (MEM) as they pursue the rebound.
Bridges (BKN) is moving alongside Stevens' (MEM) path and marginal contact occurs during the drive.
LaRavia (MEM) turns slightly towards Schroder's (BKN) path and marginal contact occurs during the driving shot attempt.
Johnson (BKN) cleanly deflects the ball away from Stevens (MEM) in the backcourt.
Johnson (BKN) cleanly deflects the ball away from Stevens (MEM).
Aldama (MEM) is firming up over his right leg and absorbs the contact from Finney-Smith (BKN) during the screen.
Finney-Smith (BKN) is moving alongside Williams Jr.'s (MEM) path and legally contests the driving shot attempt.
Aldama (MEM) wraps Claxton (BKN) and affects his FOM following the pick.
Stevens (MEM) clamps and holds Claxton's (BKN) arm, which affects his ability to pursue the rebound.
Johnson (BKN) steps forward into Kennard's (MEM) path and initiates body to body contact as Kennard moves to receive the pass.
Finney-Smith (BKN) is firming up over his left foot and absorbs the contact from Williams Jr. (MEM) during the screen.
LaRavia (MEM) brushes Johnson's (BKN) arm, and marginal contact occurs prior to LaRavia dislodging the ball from Johnson.
Johnson (BKN) cleanly dislodges the ball from Williams Jr. (MEM).
Williams Jr. (MEM) initiates contact with Johnson's (BKN) arm as he attempts to secure the ball.
Kennard (MEM) does not inbound the ball within five seconds.
Williams Jr. (MEM) and Johnson (BKN) briefly engage and disengage off ball.
Finney-Smith (BKN) firms up over to his left leg in Williams Jr.'s (MEM) path and absorbs the contact.
LaRavia (MEM) is drawn into the air on the pump fake by Schroder (BKN), and LaRavia initiates contact that affects Schroder's shot attempt.
Finney-Smith (BKN) cleanly dislodges the ball from Kennard (MEM).
Kennard (MEM) fully gathers the ball with his right foot planted on the floor and he proceeds to legally take two steps.  He then releases the pass before ever planting his foot for a third step.
Claxton (BKN) extends both hands forward and initiates contact with Konchar (MEM), which affects Konchar's SQBR.
Stevens (MEM) jumps forward towards Bridges (BKN) as he contests the jump shot, and he initiates body to body contact after the release of the shot.
Bridges (BKN) breaks the plane of the free throw line before the shot hits the rim.
Claxton (BKN) extends his hands forward and initiates contact with Konchar (MEM) that affects his FOM.
Johnson (BKN) is the last player to touch the ball before the ball goes out of bounds.  Possession is correctly awarded to the Grizzlies.
Kennard (MEM) brings his forearm towards Bridges (BKN), and marginal contact occurs as he releases away to receive the pass.
